caption.p: Cell viability of RAW 264.7 macrophages incubated with medicinal plant decoctions (40 μg plant mash/mL) ( a), different concentrations of native (white) or oxidized low-density lipoproteins (LDL) (black) ( b), cytotoxic concentration of ox-LDL (200 μg/mL) ( c). Data shown are means ± SD of three independent experiments. *** p < 0.005 as compared to 1% Triton X-100; # p < 0.05; ## p < 0.01, ### p < 0.005 as compared to control (Ctrl).
